library(cio)

Predicates for C-Prolog style I/O (see/tell family)

Predicates

see(?)
No description available

No description available

No description available

No description available

No description available

No description available
tab(?, ?)
No description available
tell(?)
No description available
telling(?)
No description available
told
No description available

Description

This library provides C-Prolog compatible I/O predicates. It is included in the C-Prolog compatibility package, but can be used independently. The predicates change ECLiPSe's input or output stream, respectively.
